name: Flying Car Future Sky
description: Flying Car Future Sky is a game where you can not only drive muscle car but also fly it in air and do mad tricks. If you are bored of driving the car in town and wanted to fly your car across the skyscrapers in the city, just press the flying button wings of your car will come out, what you just need is press the throttle paddle and with speed before you know it your beast car will be in mid air and now you are a pilot controlling your jet plane. You are free to do acrobatic tricks on your modified car, move your asphalt muscle car across the whole town without worrying about the traffic or interruption from others around.
